text: The Lamborghini Jalpa is a sports car. Lamborghini built it from 1981 to 1988. The Jalpa came after the Silhouette. The Jalpa was designed by Carrozzeria Bertone. ==History== The Jalpa was introduced at the 1981 Geneva Auto Show. It was based off the Silhouette. Lamborghini designed it to be less expensive than the Countach. ==Engine and transmission== The Jalpa was powered by a V8 engine. The engine in the Jalpa came from the Silhouette.
